dmca.title: [EV1-C1125864V] Illegal content detected on your servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: EV1 Abuse Posted At: Friday, September 29, 2006 10:34 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1125864V] Illegal content detected on your servers Subject: [EV1-C1125864V] Illegal content detected on your servers ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Illegal content detected on your servers Added by system at Tuesday, Sep 26 2006 05:01 pm X-MailFrom: admin@frikisfansub.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.211] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Sep 26 17:00:54 2006 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by MAILCORE.THEPLANET.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 26 Sep 2006 16:54:54 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 26 Sep 2006 16:54:53 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1159307687-22781-106-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from nf-out-f131.google.com (nf-out-0910.google.com [64.233.182.131]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 9B1DCCBF3 for ; Tue, 26 Sep 2006 16:54:52 -0500 (CDT) Received: by nf-out-f131.google.com with SMTP id x9so78252nfb for ; Tue, 26 Sep 2006 14:54:36 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.65.159.2 with SMTP id l2mr2023559qbo; Tue, 26 Sep 2006 14:54:36 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.65.135.15 with HTTP; Tue, 26 Sep 2006 14:54:36 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <7a0681e50609261454l6a8ab882uda0ebbc444231d70@mail.gmail.com> Date: Tue, 26 Sep 2006 23:54:36 +0200 From: "=?ISO-8859-1?Q?Ram=F3n_Liste_Moreno?=" To: abuse@ev1servers.net X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Illegal content detected on your servers Subject: Illegal content detected on your servers MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_13600_6049592.1159307676356" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: admin@frikisfansub.net X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Sep 2006 21:54:53.0484 (UTC) FILETIME=[65CC8EC0:01C6E1B6] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Good night, I'm writting you because I detect illegal content in one of your servers. The page is: http://www.tienda-anime.com The domain links to one of your IP. I make a traceroute from my linux: motu@04-server:~$ traceroute www.tienda-anime.com traceroute to tienda-anime.com (66.98.178.28), 30 hops max, 40 byte packets 1 C6K9.Paris.fr.ctn1.net (195.140.140.254) 0.478 ms 0.250 ms 0.252 ms 2 vlan910.frpar1-cr1.ndsoftware.net (195.140.148.49) 0.322 ms 0.245 ms 0.222 ms 3 cogent.FreeIX.net (213.228.3.187) 0.819 ms 0.752 ms 1.167 ms 4 p14-0.core02.dca01.atlas.cogentco.com (66.28.4.206) 80.789 ms 83.362ms 80.715 ms 5 p15-0.core01.dca01.atlas.cogentco.com (66.28.4.21) 85.193 ms 81.402ms 80.873 ms 6 p3-0.core01.iah01.atlas.cogentco.com (66.28.4.90) 123.192 ms 123.027ms 123.301 ms 7 EveryonesInternet.demarc.cogentco.com (38.112.12.186) 124.135 ms 123.777 ms 123.681 ms 8 ivhou-207-218-245-27.ev1.net (207.218.245.27) 123.848 ms 125.055 ms 124.068 ms 9 ivhou-207-218-245-111.ev1.net (207.218.245.111) 124.440 ms 124.509 ms 125.423 ms 10 ev1s-66-98-178-28.ev1servers.net (66.98.178.28) 131.531 ms 124.215 ms 124.429 ms The fansub groups subtitle anime for free for promotional use only, that are distributed by P2P, when an anime is licensed we retire our version. Fansubs groups don't make illegal actions because they don't sell any anime. In this page are advertise selling (and sell) of anime from fansubs groups that the owners of the Copyright owner are: TvTokio, Sunrise, Viz, Bandai, NHK, etc. The copyright owners of the subtitles put by hardsub method in the animes are property of the respective fansubs (Frikis Fansub, Frozen-Layer Fansub, OtakUniverse, ...). The material is located in: http://www.tienda-anime.com You can contact us (Frikis Fansub) in: telephone: +0034653257879 by mail: admin@frikisfansub.net in fansub forum: http://foro.frikisfansub.net in IRC: #frikisfansub @ irc.immortal-anime.net The owner of this site hasn't been authorised by Frikis Fansub, Otakuniverse, etc to use our Hard-sub subtitles to be selled, because we distribute this free. The owner of this site hasn't been authorised by TvTokyo, NHK, etc to be an authorised reseller (licenser) of these Anime: Bleach, Full Metal Alchemist, Full Metal Alchemist OVAS, Sakura Card Captor, etc. By all, we request you to delete these web, inform to these owner of this situation, and, if it can be made, send us user data to take legal action in the Spanish jurisdiction. Regards, The administration of [F+F]Frikis Fansub. http://www.frikisfansub.net MIME element (text/html) Good night,

The fansub groups subtitle anime for free for promotional use only, that
are
distributed by P2P, when an anime is licensed we retire our version.
Fansubs
groups don't make illegal actions because they don't sell any anime.

In this page are advertise selling (and sell) of anime from fansubs groups that the
owners of the Copyright owner are: TvTokio, Sunrise, Viz, Bandai,  NHK,
etc.
The copyright owners of the subtitles put by hardsub method in the
animes
are property of the respective fansubs (Frikis Fansub, Frozen-Layer
Fansub,
OtakUniverse, ...).

The material is located in: http://www.tienda-anime.com
You can contact us (Frikis Fansub) in: telephone: +0034653257879
by mail: admin@frikisfansub.net
in fansub forum: http://foro.frikisfansub.net
in IRC: #frikisfansub @ irc.immortal-anime.net

The owner of this site hasn't been authorised by Frikis Fansub,
Otakuniverse,
etc to use our Hard-sub subtitles to be selled, because we distribute
this
free.
The owner of this site hasn't been authorised by TvTokyo, NHK, etc to be
an
authorised reseller (licenser) of these Anime: Bleach, Full Metal
Alchemist,
Full Metal Alchemist OVAS, Sakura Card Captor, etc.

By all, we request you to delete these web, inform to these owner
of this situation, and, if it can be made, send us user data to take
legal
action in the Spanish jurisdiction.

Regards,
The administration of [F+F]Frikis Fansub.
http://www.frikisfansub.net MIME element (text/plain)
